about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hi, I'm a frontend developer and UX/UI designer who loves crafting clean, accessible, and user-centric web experiences. My work bridges design and development, with a strong focus on usability, performance, and visual clarity.
about.paragraph2: In recent projects, I've been responsible for both the visual and frontend aspects of product development. I build responsive interfaces using Vue 3 and the Quasar framework, and I've also implemented system email features through Laravel. I specialize in turning design concepts into well-structured, maintainable code that supports a smooth user experience.
about.paragraph3: I've contributed to a range of products, including CRM tools, digital twin platforms, IoT dashboards, and e-commerce websites. These experiences have deepened my understanding of how system logic connects to user behavior, and how thoughtful design can bridge that gap.
about.paragraph4: I'm always eager to explore new tools, design systems, and technologies. I stay up-to-date with the latest trends in UX and frontend development, and I enjoy refining products by identifying user pain points and transforming feedback into meaningful improvements.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesign.description: Gained a strong foundation in visual communication and became proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.

ucsdVisualArt.title: Visual Arts – Interdisciplinary Computer & Art
ucsdVisualArt.description: Explored the intersection of art and technology, applying creative thinking and technical skills to develop innovative design solutions.

details.title: VR Projects (2018/08)
items: My Surrealism (Individual): Designed a surreal virtual environment using Unity3D, Google Blocks, and C#.
Mind Constructed World (Team): Built a virtual experience game in Unity with remote transmission features, enabling players to navigate between worlds.

hunchTech.title: UI/UX Designer
hunchTech.intro: Focused on UI/UX design, copywriting and website creation publishing by wix.
details: Designed and published app landing pages using Wix and Firebase Hosting.
Wrote bilingual copy and App Store listing materials.

nadiSystem.title: UI/UX Designer
nadiSystem.intro: Worked on projects including smart building systems, data centers, digital twin platforms, and backend management tools, focusing on interface design, data visualization, interactive motion design, and prototyping.
details: 【FarEasTone 5G Telecom Project】Responsible for UI/UX design and data visualization, using Unity to build layouts, create interactive charts, and design a backend editing system.
【Foxconn Wisconsin Project】Responsible for UI/UX and data visualization in a smart factory system, using Unity and Figma to build interfaces and create interactive prototypes.
【Cathay United Bank Data Center】Responsible for UI/UX design and data visualization, using Unity to create animated and interactive interfaces.
【Giant Headquarters】Contributed to UI/UX design for a smart building system, using Figma to plan interface structure and Unity to create interactive visual components.
【Delta Shanghai Project】Contributed to UI/UX design for a smart building platform, focusing on data design and visualization planning.

rogersAI.title: UI/UX Designer
rogersAI.intro: Responsible for UI/UX design of a 3D facial recognition system and IoT-based backend platform, along with several related projects, covering information architecture, component systems, and interaction flows.
details: Conducted usability testing and A/B testing to optimize user flows.
Designed component systems and modules, providing clear Figma specifications.
Created interactive prototypes to validate user flows and design hypotheses.

woWorld.title: UI/UX & Frontend Developer
woWorld.intro: Worked on UI/UX design and frontend development for an e-commerce platform to improve the overall user experience.
details: Developed reusable frontend components and layouts using Vue 3 and Quasar.
Participated in UI/UX design and implemented the login page interface.
Optimized user flows and interactions based on A/B testing results.
Created system email modules using Laravel.

invoice.title: Invoice App
invoice.description: In this invoice app, users can create, edit, and delete invoice records. All data is stored in Firebase.

jsModule.title: JS Module
jsModule.description: This project showcases multiple functional modules built with vanilla JavaScript, focusing on DOM manipulation, event handling, and logic flow across UI and data interaction scenarios.

saas.title: SaaS Landing Page
saas.description: A modern SaaS landing page built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring animations, dark mode, and a fully responsive layout.

shop.title: Shopping Website
shop.description: A shopping cart built with JavaScript, featuring a sidebar for editing item quantities, supporting product addition, quantity adjustment, and checkout confirmation.

film.title: Film Explorer
film.description: A responsive movie search site built with the OMDb API, featuring Swiper-based sliders and real-time dynamic search.
